title: Xplora 1: Peter Gabriel's secret world (MAC)
creator_credit: Peter Gabriel and Real World Multi Media
brief_description: There are just three things you need to keep in mind as you make your way through Peter’s world… Xplore, Xperiment, Xperience. It’s up to you to find your way on your journey. You decide which direction you want to go in. Don’t be afraid to explore - click around and find out for yourself what happens and where it takes you.
